name: ULSeeHomeButler
0:
”Alexa ask home butler check my step count.”
”Alexa ask home butler check my heart rate.”
”Alexa ask home butler check my temperature.”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: home butler
des:
Our skill offers users the convenience of obtaining device information with basic voice command. The skills work with most ULSee Home Butler devices and give users read out of device data and status. To take full advantages of Home Butler Skill, users must first purchase Alex Smart Speakers and ULSee Home Butler Wearable. 
Setup Steps:
1.     Download Alexa App (iOS or Android) on your phone.  Setup and login under your own account
2.     Load ULSee custom skill onto your Alexa App account
3.     During the setup, the Alexa App will require your device ID which can be found on the back of your ULSee Home Butler wearable device. 
4.     Once your device is linked to your Alexa account, you may start using the Home Butler Skill with the wearable 
Skill Functions
1.     Read out temperature from your ULSee wearable device.
2.     Read out daily step counts from your ULSee wearable device.
3.     Read out your heart rate your ULSee wearable device.
